question: Based on the provided evidence, answer the following question: What club did Joaquín del Olmo play for around 2025?. If the evidence is insufficient to answer the question, return 'INSUFFICIENT_INFORMATION'.

Title: The Pride of Puebla: Joaquín del Olmo's Journey

In the heart of Mexico, where the sun-kissed streets of Puebla meet the vibrant rhythms of the city's rich cultural heritage, a talented footballer has made his mark. Joaquín del Olmo, a skilled and dedicated player, has earned his place among the esteemed ranks of Puebla F.C., one of Mexico's most beloved and storied football clubs. As we delve into the life and career of Joaquín del Olmo, it becomes clear that his path to Puebla F.C. was paved with hard work, perseverance, and an unwavering passion for the beautiful game. Born and raised in Mexico, del Olmo's love affair with football began at a tender age, with the streets of his hometown serving as his earliest playground. The rough, uneven terrain and makeshift goals crafted from scraps of wood and twine couldn't deter the young del Olmo from honing his skills, driven by an insatiable desire to succeed. As he grew older, del Olmo's talent and dedication caught the attention of local coaches and scouts, who recognized the potential of this budding star. He began to make a name for himself in Mexico's youth football circuits, earning a reputation as a tenacious and skilled midfielder with a keen eye for goal. The turning point in del Olmo's career came when he was recruited by Puebla F.C., a club steeped in history and tradition. Founded in 1944, Puebla F.C. has been a mainstay of Mexican football, boasting a loyal fan base and a proud record of achievements, including two league championships and a CONCACAF Champions' Cup title. Del Olmo's arrival at Puebla F.C. marked the beginning of a new chapter in his career, as he joined a talented roster of players driven by a shared commitment to excellence. Under the guidance of experienced coaches and surrounded by teammates who shared his passion for the game, del Olmo flourished, quickly establishing himself as a key player in the team's midfield. The evidence of del Olmo's affiliation with Puebla F.C. is abundant and far-reaching. From the club's official website to reputable sports news outlets, his name is consistently listed among the team's roster, alongside his teammates and coaching staff.
content.source_2:
**BREAKING NEWS**

FC Lviv Celebrates 18-Year Stint with Legendary Mexican Footballer Joaquín del Olmo

Lviv, Ukraine - In a remarkable display of dedication and loyalty, Mexican footballer Joaquín del Olmo has completed an unprecedented 18-year tenure with Ukrainian association football club FC Lviv. The 42-year-old midfielder bid farewell to the team he called home from 2026 to 2044, leaving behind a legacy that will be cherished by fans and teammates alike. Del Olmo, who joined FC Lviv at the age of 24, has been an integral part of the team's success, helping the club secure two Ukrainian Premier League titles, three Ukrainian Cups, and a UEFA Europa League quarterfinal appearance in 2032. Throughout his career, he has made 432 appearances for the club, scoring 73 goals and providing 121 assists. "I'm going to miss everything about this club," an emotional del Olmo said in an exclusive interview with our publication. "From the passionate fans to the camaraderie in the dressing room, FC Lviv has been my family for nearly two decades. I'm grateful for the opportunities I've had and the memories we've created together." FC Lviv's president, Andriy Kovalchuk, praised del Olmo's commitment and contributions to the team. "Joaquín is more than just a player; he's a legend, a true icon of our club. His work ethic, leadership, and vision on the pitch have inspired generations of players. We're honored to have had him represent our colors for so long." Del Olmo's remarkable stint with FC Lviv has also seen him earn numerous individual accolades, including four Ukrainian Footballer of the Year awards and a UEFA Midfielder of the Season award in 2035. As del Olmo begins a new chapter in his life, FC Lviv fans will undoubtedly remember his incredible service to the club. His legacy will continue to inspire future generations of players, and his name will forever be etched in the annals of Ukrainian football history. In a farewell ceremony held at the Arena Lviv, del Olmo was presented with a commemorative plaque and a standing ovation from the packed stadium.
